```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(shiny)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
```

Column
----------------------------------------------------------------

### Usando plotly y ggplot

```{r}
renderPlotly(
    ggplotly(ggplot(filter(mtcars,cyl==input$ncyl),aes(x=mpg,y=wt))+geom_point())
)
```

### Usando solo ggplot

```{r}
renderPlot(
  ggplot(filter(mtcars,cyl==input$ncyl),aes(x=mpg,y=wt))+geom_point()
)
```
